abstract.t: This document defines an SNMP-based message tracking model forelectronic messaging management usage. Message tracking is theability to find out, after the fact, the path that a particular messagetook through the messaging system, the current status of thatmessage, and its characteristics. This document defines the model, architecture, and requirements for messagetracking. An SNMP MIB to support message tracking is found in a relateddocument.
